```{r}
db <- dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), "earthquakes.duckdb",
                read_only = TRUE)

```

```{sql}
#| connection: db
SELECT * EXCLUDE (column_path, segment_id, start, stats, 
                  persistent, block_id, block_offset, has_updates)
FROM pragma_storage_info('earthquakes')
USING SAMPLE 10 ROWS
ORDER BY row_group_id;
```
